protein.specific_function: This protein promotes the GTP-dependent translocation of the nascent protein chain from the A-site to the P-site of the ribosome

go_class.description: hydrolase activity, acting on acid anhydrides
hydrolase activity, acting on acid anhydrides, in phosphorus-containing anhydrides
